snippet: After 20 years, two NBA Finals meetings and countless major moments, Kobe Bryant cherishes the history and tradition of the Los Angeles Lakers' rivalry with the Boston Celtics....
lead_paragraph: After 20 years, two NBA Finals meetings and countless major moments, Kobe Bryant cherishes the history and tradition of the Los Angeles Lakers' rivalry with the Boston Celtics.

headline.main: Boston Celtics Survive Kobe Bryant's 34, Beat Lakers 107-100
headline.print_headline: Boston Celtics Survive Kobe Bryant's 34, Beat Lakers 107-100
